answers.answer: I had preeclamsia with my first. Its scary. Do u think u have it?
I have had high blood pressure my whole pregnancy. Then this week I started swelling really bad so they are running tests to see what's going on. I'm 34 weeks

Yes I had preeclampsia I had my baby October 8 at 28 weeks I wasn't due until December 27. My signs was headache that didnt stop no matter wat I took n face swollen. Wen I got to the hospital my bp was 181/106 they had to do an emergency c section on me.
My first was born at 27 weeks due to HELLP Syndrome. BP is nothing to play around with.
My first was born at 35wks, bp was 170/140. Developed it again this pregnancy but not as severely and hoping to make it to my csection at 36wks.
Im 29 weeks and my last 3 dr appointments my bp has been up so now there running test to see what's going on .... my last bp was 140/98

question: Has anyone else have problems with there blood pressure being high?!
title: preeclampsia
